Your personal data are disclosed, we do not make them available and we do not provide them to any other entities.By registering, you give us concent to the processing of your personal data. Some of them have a charakter as personal data in the mening of the Act no. 122/2013 Z.z. about protection of personal data (next only the “Act”) In Slovak Republic we follow this Act for using of your data. In accordance with § 28 of the Act you have a right to request information about the processing of your personal data and the list of personal data which are being processed, the right to correction of incorrect, incomplete or outdated personal data, the right of elimination of personal data if the purpose of processing ends, the right to object of the use of your personal data for marketing purposes on the base of a free written request. We are entitled to process your personal data even after end of the original purpose of processing only to the extend cases for statistics, accounting and research and provide to the third parties or to the public of overall statistical information about customers, attandance, sales and other information but in annonymous form, so based on them will be no way to identify our customers. Time of collection and processing of personal data is identical to the duration of the contract about providing the service. Samuel Bilý is entitled to record keeping of personal data for the purposes of billing, record keeping and collection of claims for services, for the purpose of arrange applying for the parties, to use the law or to comply with other obligations imposed by generally binding legal regulations even after termination of the service contract. In accordance with § 13 paragraph. 3 of the Act about protection of personal data, participant acknowledges that Samuel Bilý, Ltd. is not entitled to eliminate the personal data of participant after the termination of the contract until expiry the limits stated in the specific regulations.By making contract,participant gives consent to the collecting and processing of personal data in this range.
